title: Cork Stool
subtitle: Compressed Cork Side Table & Stool
description: Formed from compressed Portuguese cork, this piece functions as both a sturdy stool and a minimalist side table. Its monolithic shape is softened by subtle brass inlays.

title: Magnet Lamp
subtitle: Modular Concrete & Light Tube Lamp
description: A study in contrasts. A raw concrete base grounds a delicate, fluted light tube held in place by a single, powerful neodymium magnet. The light can be positioned freely, offering a playful interaction.
materials: Cast Concrete, Fluted Acrylic, Neodymium Magnet, LED

title: Stone Glass
subtitle: Hand-blown Glass with Volcanic Stone
description: A moment of fusion between two natural elements. Hand-blown glass is shaped around a piece of raw volcanic basalt, creating a unique tactile and visual experience where smooth meets rough.

title: Flower Stand
subtitle: Minimalist Stainless Steel Flower Stand
description: Inspired by the Japanese art of flower arranging, this stand isolates each stem in its own polished steel holder. A sculptural piece that celebrates the singular beauty of each flower.
